content:
<rule id="technology-usage-markup-01000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <graph-query discriminator="HtmlFile"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <technology-identified name="HTML">
                    <tag name="View"/>
                    <tag name="Embedded"/>
                    <tag name="Markup"/>
                </technology-identified>
            </perform>
        </rule>
